text: Ithi, “Ngakube nginitshelile yini ngokubi kakhulu kunalokho mayelana nomvuzo (izijeziso) esikuMvelinqangi labo abaqalekiswe uMvelinqangi futhi wehlisela ulaka phezulu kwabo wabenza izinkawu nezingulube futhi bakhonza onkulunkulu bamanga labo-ke isimo sabo sibi kakhulu futhi badukile endleleni eqondile”
